revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SmartRG |model=SR808ac |fcc_date=09/20/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=VW7SR808A |ic_id=11130A-SR808A |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3384 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N01HVSINA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1705 P20, 139-04 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1705 P20, 139-04 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG,TN1835 P21, 624435-23 P3 W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=SmartRG-XXXX, SmartRG-XXXX-5G |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_pass=Broadcom }} {{TagLine|802.11ac DOCSIS 3.0 Gateway}}
"CABLE-BCM020-0001 REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
FCC photos include a picture with the Broadcom CPU de-lidded but the CPU ID are not legible. The User Manual document refers to the product as the "BCM3384"
DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 channels<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }}
DFS was added to the FCC with a Class II Permissive Change request on 11/15/2017.
==See also== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]]
